entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You should be able to make a deal with some of the Jawas now. Try giving them some of the juice you collected.
entries.journal_entry_description: Apparently the Jawas will not work with you unless you present them with some sort of gift first. The droid has told you about how much the Jawas like a drink made from the juice of Pika fruit. There are a few bushes in the area. You might try collecting a few of these fruit and see if it will make friends with the Jawa.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The protocol droid told you that you probably wouldn't get any help from the Jawas until you can present them with something they want. He suggested a good start would be juice for a favorite drink of the Jawas. The fruit can be found in plants that grow around the Jawa camp.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You were able to find enough plants to get enough juice for the drink. Go back to the protocol droid and have him make the drink.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Look for Pika plants at this location
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Look for Pika plants at this location
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Look for Pika plants at this location
